skills.title: Keep Calm
skills.description: I was once the guy who despairs if something goes wrong, but today I just grab a coffee and try to fix that problem.

skills.title: Organization
skills.description: I wasn't always organized, until I got a totally messy and poorly structured project. That was the last time I didn't value the organization, since then, I value standardization and organization.

skills.title: Communication
skills.description: Communication is fundamental to everything, it's no different with codes. Understanding and getting through what should be done is of paramount importance, so asking questions is also important.

skills.title: Code
skills.description: My codes are well standardized, componentized and 'readable'. It's really hard to make me give up on a problem when I find one, I love doing something new and seeing it work out so much.
